Where can I find more information about Verus?

There are several resources available to learn more about Verus. You can visit the Veruscoin Foundation website, the Veruscoin Explorer, the GitHub repo, or follow the official Twitter account, Community Twitter, Community YouTube, Community Facebook, or Community website.
